### Invitation to Tender
### Remplacement de la culasse de la génératrice diesel

#### Government of Canada - Canadian Food Inspection Agency
#### PW-23-01019998

* **Reference Number** : PW-23-01019998
* **Solicitation Number** : A0123C (2023-00454)
* **Amendment Number** : 1

#### Bidder's Information
[TSquaredIQ](https://github.com/Tsquared-iq)

#### Tender Description

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency is soliciting for the removal and installation of a new breeching for the facilities emergency power diesel generator at the Charlottetown Laboratory. This tender opportunity is for a single bidder.

The construction time for this project shall be 30 September 2023.

#### Mandatory Site Visit
A site visit is mandatory for interested bidders. The visit will take place on 18 January 2023 at 10:00 a.m. (Prince Edward Island time). Bidders are to meet at Charlottetown Laboratory (93 Mount Edward Road, Charlottetown, PE C1A 5T1) at the front entrance.

#### Tender Documents
* Tender Documents: A0123C_-_Invitation_-_English.pdf
* Tender Documents: A0123C_-_Invitation_-_French.pdf
* Amendment to Tender: A0123C_-_Addendum_1_english.pdf
* Amendment to Tender: A0123C_-_Addendum_1_french.pdf
You can download these documents at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents

#### Submissions
Bids must be submitted only to the Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) Bid Receiving by the date, time, and place indicated on page 1 of the bid solicitation.
